name: supertrend - booming bulls
description: Buy CE/PE options when price is in a bullish zone (above SMA 13 and SuperTrend 4,11). Entry happens at the SuperTrend 3,10 level — like a dynamic support-based limit order.
_comment_indicators: We use 3 indicators, all calculated on the option contract price (not spot). Two SuperTrends with different sensitivity and one SMA.

indicators._comment: SuperTrend (factor=4, ATR=11) — slower, used to confirm the trend is bullish.
indicators.name: opt_st_4_11

indicators._comment: Simple Moving Average (13 period) — acts as a trend filter. Price must be above this.
indicators.name: opt_sma_13

indicators._comment: SuperTrend (factor=3, ATR=10) — faster/tighter. This is the entry level. We buy when price touches this line.
indicators.name: opt_st_3_10

_comment_signal: Both conditions must be TRUE (AND logic) to trigger an alert. These are NOT the entry — they just say 'market is bullish, start watching for entry'.

signal_conditions._comment: Condition 1: Option close price must be ABOVE the 13-period SMA.
Condition 2: Option close price must be ABOVE the slower SuperTrend (4,11) line.

_comment_direction: buy = we are buying options (CE or PE). The system observes ATM strikes of nearest expiry.
_comment_entry: Entry type is 'indicator_level'. Once the signal fires (bullish alert), we place a dynamic limit order at the faster SuperTrend (3,10) value. Entry happens only when price actually touches that level — like buying at support.
_comment_risk: Stop loss at 5% below entry. Target profit at 7.5% above entry. If neither hits, position is closed at trading_end time (EOD exit).
_comment_session: Only look for signals between 09:30 and 15:15. Trades are squared off at 15:15 if still open.
_comment_instruments: Run this strategy on both NIFTY and SENSEX options.
_comment_backtest: Backtest period and starting capital for simulation.
